mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO T06_PER_HISTORY ( PER_ID , EVENT_TYPE , EVENT_DATE , EVENT_TIME , LATITUDE , LONGITUDE , TITLE , COVERIMAGE , PRAISE , ISPUBLIC , REMARKS , CREATE_DATE , CREATE_TIME ) VALUES ( #{pERID} , #{eVENTTYPE} , #{eVENTDATE} , #{eVENTTIME} , #{lATITUDE} , #{lONGITUDE} , #{tITLE} , #{cOVERIMAGE} , #{pRAISE} , #{iSPUBLIC} , #{rEMARKS} , #{cREATEDATE} , #{cREATETIME} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update: UPDATE T06_PER_HISTORY SET PER_ID = #{pERID} , EVENT_TYPE = #{eVENTTYPE} , EVENT_DATE = #{eVENTDATE} , EVENT_TIME = #{eVENTTIME} , LATITUDE = #{lATITUDE} , LONGITUDE = #{lONGITUDE} , TITLE = #{tITLE} , COVERIMAGE = #{cOVERIMAGE} , PRAISE = #{pRAISE} , ISPUBLIC = #{iSPUBLIC} , REMARKS = #{rEMARKS} , CREATE_DATE = #{cREATEDATE} , CREATE_TIME = #{cREATETIME} WHERE ID = #{iD}
mapper.select: SELECT ID AS "iD" , PER_ID AS "pERID" , EVENT_TYPE AS "eVENTTYPE" , EVENT_DATE AS "eVENTDATE" , EVENT_TIME AS "eVENTTIME" , LATITUDE AS "lATITUDE" , LONGITUDE AS "lONGITUDE" , TITLE AS "tITLE" , COVERIMAGE AS "cOVERIMAGE" , PRAISE AS "pRAISE" , ISPUBLIC AS "iSPUBLIC" , REMARKS AS "rEMARKS" , CREATE_DATE AS "cREATEDATE" , CREATE_TIME AS "cREATETIME" FROM T06_PER_HISTORY WHERE ID = #{iD}

SELECT ID AS "iD" , PER_ID AS "pERID" , EVENT_TYPE AS "eVENTTYPE" , EVENT_DATE AS "eVENTDATE" , EVENT_TIME AS "eVENTTIME" , LATITUDE AS "lATITUDE" , LONGITUDE AS "lONGITUDE" , TITLE AS "tITLE" , COVERIMAGE AS "cOVERIMAGE" , PRAISE AS "pRAISE" , ISPUBLIC AS "iSPUBLIC" , REMARKS AS "rEMARKS" , CREATE_DATE AS "cREATEDATE" , CREATE_TIME AS "cREATETIME" FROM T06_PER_HISTORY WHERE ID = #{iD} FOR UPDATE

SELECT ID AS "iD" , PER_ID AS "pERID" , EVENT_TYPE AS "eVENTTYPE" , EVENT_DATE AS "eVENTDATE" , EVENT_TIME AS "eVENTTIME" , LATITUDE AS "lATITUDE" , LONGITUDE AS "lONGITUDE" , TITLE AS "tITLE" , COVERIMAGE AS "cOVERIMAGE" , PRAISE AS "pRAISE" , ISPUBLIC AS "iSPUBLIC" , REMARKS AS "rEMARKS" , CREATE_DATE AS "cREATEDATE" , CREATE_TIME AS "cREATETIME" FROM T06_PER_HISTORY WHERE ${_dynamicWhereCondition} ORDER BY ID ORDER BY ${_orderByCondition} FETCH FIRST ${_fetchFirstCondition} ROWS ONLY LIMIT ${_limitCondition} OFFSET ${_offsetCondition}
